item.title: Blog Setup
item.description: This is a How-to Article for quickly setting up a blog with Quartz and Obsidian.md. Prerequisites Obsidian installed on your local machine (because Quartz is Markdown-based) Github-Account Basic Knowledge of Github and Git.

item.title: First Blog entry
item.description: Hey there, For our games lecture at DHBW Karlsruhe we have to run a blog, where we tell you about our findings and development of our game “A Journey of Music”.
